item.description:
Wear athletic clothing, but dress for the weather! It can get chilly out on the water, so bring a fleece jacket or a wind breaker. Bring some water or anything else you normally carry when exercising.

A quick warm up will be followed by 60 to 90 minutes of paddling on the Charles. We'll run through a series of drills designed to improve paddling technique.

Practice will end at 8pm, and many paddlers will then move on to one of the local restaurants or watering holes.

Send questions to: Dave Parker at dfitzparker@gmail.com

www.livingroot.org
item.how_to_find_us: I'm guy wearing a life jacket and holding a clipboard.
item.why: Learn to dragon boat, get a tan, build some muscle, make some friends, challenge yourself.
item.name: Tuesday Dragon Boat Practice
